data.name: Aria and the Crystal Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
Wield cards as your weapon in this deck-building fantasy RPG inspired by Slay the Spire and Paper Mario! Battle against enemies in strategic turn-based combat, travel across a hand-drawn world, customize your deck, and grow strong enough to face whatever lies ahead!

Card-battler combat

Face down a variety of enemies, each with their own unique behaviors!

Explore randomly-generated dungeons

Dungeon maps change with every visit, so playtime is limitless!

Customize your experience

Build your deck, upgrade your favorite cards, and equip accessories to craft your own unique playstyle!

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
